m_szDocSumamry: Prayers-read by the Lord Bishop of Gloucester. Introduction: Baroness Sherlock 2.22 pm Maeve Christina Mary Sherlock OBE, having been created Baroness Sherlock, of Durham in the County of Durham, was introduced and took the oath, supported by Baroness Hollis of Heigham and Baroness Prosser, and signed an undertaking to abide by the Code of Conduct.
